function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of wastewater temperature on virus load stability and degradation","Impact":"Increased virus load stability in wastewater due to temperature and long in-sewer travel time","Mitigation":"Implement measures to decrease virus load stability and degradation in wastewater","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment technologies, temperature control measures","People":"Public health and environmental authorities, wastewater treatment organizations","Owner":"Public health and environmental authorities, wastewater treatment organizations"},{"Description":"Effect of seasonal temperature changes on biomarker degradation in wastewater","Impact":"Variability in biomarker degradation due to seasonal temperature changes","Mitigation":"Develop methods to compensate for temperature-dependent degradation of biomarkers in wastewater","Technologies":"Temperature monitoring and control systems, data analytics for temperature-adjusted degradation","People":"Environmental researchers, wastewater management organizations","Owner":"Environmental researchers, wastewater management organizations"}]}
